attributes.title: DISAPPOINTED
attributes.review: IT MADE MY PHONE GLICTH!!!! The worst app ever! I had to throw the whole phone away 😔 I just wanted to support the president 🚮 Not to mention the download took 5 days to complete. Now I have to use a banana as a phone thanks a lot 😩

attributes.title: Why O’ Why did you leave me?
attributes.review: Why did you have to go so soon? I needed you, but you left! How crude of you! I will continue writing letters until you notice me! Why O’ Why did you leave me? Goodbye.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This low budget app took me 3 days to download. Once it finally downloaded I opened the app and it caused my iPhone crashed. Fairly certain I now have a virus 😢

attributes.title: Fantastic
attributes.review: Great resource and tools to stay informed

attributes.title: Beyond trash
attributes.review: This app is useless, no good at all. It’s full of trashy info and false facts. Worst of all, they sell your number and you get non-stop marketing calls. Whatever you do, DO NOT get this app!

attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: This app belongs is the trash💕💅🏻💋❤️ this app took 3 days THREE DAYS I jsut want the support my lovely president #trumpforthegrave2020 🧚🏼✨💅🏻 this app is disgusting and a disgrace to the human race. This app needs to be deleted ASAP. Lots of pictures of an Oompa-Loompa. I can’t with the orange fake tan mf . Kill him 😍✨💋🤩💋💕💕

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: It is the worst app ever do not use it it’s a waste of time and u get a Notification every Second and when u open it The Notification it just says (hi how ur day)

attributes.title: Wish I could rate 0
attributes.review: Don’t recommend, 0/5 star rating, shouldn’t of been made in the first place... the app itself was trash as well.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app is terrible. Thousands of one star reviews and I’m right there with them. I could not keep this on my phone. Deleted immediately.

attributes.title: Stupid trump
attributes.review: Trump doesn’t care about coronavirus and is an idiot
